hero.title: Celebrating Sub-Saharan Africa
hero.description: Discover the exceptional cultural richness of Sub-Saharan Africa through our international community of enthusiasts. Arts, music, traditions, gastronomy - let's explore this extraordinary heritage together in the spirit of service.

about.title: Our Mission
about.subtitle: A Fellowship dedicated to Sub-Saharan Culture
about.description1: Our international Fellowship unites enthusiasts from around the world in celebrating Sub-Saharan culture. We build intercultural bridges through art, music, literature and traditions from this extraordinary region.
about.description2: In the spirit of service and intercultural exchange, we foster cultural encounters, mutual learning and understanding between peoples. Our members, from several countries, organize events, conferences and projects that showcase the richness of Sub-Saharan heritage.
about.solidarity: Solidarity & Action: True to community service values, we also occasionally participate in solidarity actions to support communities through generosity and local initiatives, combining cultural passion with humanitarian commitment.
about.open: Open to all enthusiasts, our Fellowship welcomes anyone wishing to discover and share this fascinating culture.

flavours.title: Flavours
flavours.description: Showcasing the cultural richness of Sub-Saharan Africa

solidarity.title: Solidarity
solidarity.description: Taking action to support communities through generosity and local initiatives

arts.title: Arts & Expression
arts.description: Traditional and contemporary music, visual arts (sculpture, painting, textiles), dance and live performance, crafts and design. Let's explore the full richness of Sub-Saharan artistic expression.

literature.title: Literature & Languages
literature.description: Contemporary and oral literature, tales and narrative traditions, linguistic diversity. Author meetings, reading clubs and celebration of African narrative heritage.

cuisine.title: Cuisine & Gastronomy
cuisine.description: Traditional dishes by region, culinary ingredients and techniques, food culture. Tastings, cooking classes and discovery of authentic flavors from Sub-Saharan Africa.

fashion.title: Fashion & Style
fashion.description: Traditional textiles (wax, kente, bogolan), contemporary African fashion, jewelry and accessories. Fashion shows, workshops and showcasing of modern and traditional African elegance.

society.title: Society & Traditions
society.description: Rituals and celebrations, philosophies and spiritualities, traditional and modern architecture. Conferences, cultural visits and exploration of Sub-Saharan societal foundations.

news.title: Cultural News
news.description: Festivals and events, portraits of contemporary artists, cultural news. Cultural monitoring, event promotion and highlighting emerging and established talents.

governance.title: Organization & Governance
governance.description: The Fellowship is guided by a steering committee composed of Rotarians from diverse professional and cultural backgrounds. The committee oversees activities, membership coordination, and ensures alignment with Rotary values. Leadership roles are voluntary and reflect the spirit of service and inclusiveness at the heart of the Fellowship.

contact.title: Join Our Community
contact.intro: Passionate about Sub-Saharan culture? Our Fellowship welcomes you with open arms. Together, let's celebrate the cultural richness of Sub-Saharan Africa and contribute to solidarity actions!
